name: Rhythm Knight
description:
A traveling knight comes across a mysterious dungeon. You are asked by the king to help uncover the mystery of a cursed dungeon. Many heroes have tried before you to conquer the monsters within, but none have returned.

Progress through in a dungeon crawler experience and unlock new weapons and spells. Roguelite gameplay and slay the monsters and defeat bosses. Use music and rhythm to time your moves and attacks in this turn based RPG.

A 2D dungeon roguelite game. Experience short turns and find the best combinations of weapons and spells. Use your unlocked skills to defeat the many monsters of the dungeon.

- Every run is unique with new weapons and spells.

- Huge enemy variety.

- Challenging boss fights.

- Story mode and endless game modes.
